entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 60%
